capture.title: Neonatal biometric capture
capture.desc: Recording newborn plantar prints using an FBI FAP 30 sensor adapted for babies.

quality.title: Quality with biometric AI
quality.desc: Automatic quality evaluation using NeoFIQ, inspired by NFIQ1 and adapted to neonates.

standards.title: Publication in medical standards
standards.desc: Biometric images are published as DICOM and FHIR within hospital systems.

hardware.title: Embedded hardware
hardware.desc: Designed for Raspberry Pi and Toradex iMX8M Plus, integrating screen and battery.

impact.title: Public health impact
impact.desc: Prevents identification errors and facilitates pediatric follow-up from birth.

identification.title: Fast identification
identification.desc: Matching algorithms allow infants to be identified from a single print.
